mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Darr, Joseph, Jr. to Anisansel, Henry
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Darr, Joseph, Jr.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Col Anisansel, Wheeling, Oct 8 1861. By Telegraph from Headquarter AM 1861. Mt. Core 8 - Capt Craig cannot purchase horses without the money according to his report & the general commanding yesterday evening telegraphed Genl Meig the necessity of furnishing it. I am going all I can to further full equipment of the regt am acting at headquarters as Provost Marshall will be glad to hear from you occasionally. Have arranged that Lieut Col Richmond at Clarksburg can use [page 2] the telegraph to communicate on military matters Maj Jo Darr Jr 71D218pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Darr, Joseph, Jr.
Headquarters AM
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Anisansel, Henry
